SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COALESCE( ( SELECT DISTINCT CHAR(39) + RTRIM(a.cd_pedido) + CHAR(39) + ',' FROM FAPEDIDO a WITH(NOLOCK) inner join fapedido fap WITH(NOLOCK) on fap.cd_cliente = a.cd_cliente and fap.Cd_unid_de_neg = a.Cd_unid_de_neg and fap.controle between ':2' and ':3' and fap.cd_pedido = ':1' where a.controle between ':2' and ':3' FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE ).value('.[1]', 'VARCHAR(MAX)'), '') Pedidos

SELECT Controle ,Tempo_dias ,Cd_pedido ,Cd_cliente FROM lc_vw_gestaopedido(NOLOCK) WHERE cd_unid_de_neg BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' AND controle BETWEEN ':3' AND ':4' AND Cd_cliente = ':5' AND Cd_pedido = CASE WHEN Cd_cliente IN ( SELECT cd_empresa FROM GEUNIDNE(NOLOCK) ) THEN ':6' ELSE Cd_pedido END ORDER BY espera DESC

ExpSyntax.val: 'Aprovado via rotina de gestao de pedido'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT FAITEMPE.Cd_material ,ESMATERI.Descricao ,ESMATERI.Peso ,SUM(FAITEMPE.Vl_total_item_l - FAITEMPE.Vl_desconto) AS total ,SUM(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo) AS demanda ,ISNULL(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel, 0) AS estoque ,ISNULL(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada, 0) AS qntreservada ,ISNULL(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel, 0) - ISNULL(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada, 0) AS disponivel ,CASE WHEN CASE WHEN ISNULL(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel, 0) - ISNULL(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada, 0) - SUM(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo) < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END = 1 THEN CASE WHEN ( SELECT MAX(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material ) IS NULL THEN 'S/D' WHEN ( SELECT MIN(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material ) = 0 THEN 'HOJE' WHEN ( SELECT MIN(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material ) > 0 THEN RTRIM(CONVERT(CHAR, ( SELECT MAX(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material ))) WHEN ( SELECT MIN(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material ) < 0 THEN RTRIM(CONVERT(CHAR, ( SELECT MAX(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material ))) END ELSE ' ' END Tempo_dias ,CASE WHEN CASE WHEN ISNULL(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel, 0) - ISNULL(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada, 0) - SUM(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo) < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END = 1 THEN CONVERT(CHAR, ( SELECT MAX(lc_vw_tempo_producao.Data) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material ), 103) ELSE ' ' END Tempo_Data FROM FAITEMPE WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN and_qntdisponivel WITH (NOLOCK) ON and_qntdisponivel.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material AND and_qntdisponivel.Cd_unidade_de_n = FAITEMPE.Cd_unid_de_neg AND and_qntdisponivel.Cd_centro_armaz = FAITEMPE.Cd_centro_armaz INNER JOIN FAPEDIDO WITH (NOLOCK) ON FAPEDIDO.Cd_pedido = FAITEMPE.Cd_pedido INNER JOIN ESMATERI WITH (NOLOCK) ON ESMATERI.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material INNER JOIN GEEMPRES WITH (NOLOCK) ON GEEMPRES.Cd_empresa = FAPEDIDO.Cd_cliente INNER JOIN GEEMPRES vendedor WITH (NOLOCK) ON vendedor.Cd_empresa = FAPEDIDO.Cd_representant WHERE FAITEMPE.Cd_pedido IN ( SELECT Cd_pedido FROM FAPEDIDO WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Cd_cliente IN ( SELECT Cd_cliente FROM FAPEDIDO f1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE f1.Cd_pedido = ':1' ) ) AND FAITEMPE.qt_saldo > 0 AND FAPEDIDO.controle BETWEEN '12' AND '26' AND FAITEMPE.Cd_unid_de_neg = ( SELECT Cd_unid_de_neg FROM FAPEDIDO WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Cd_pedido = ':1' ) AND ISNULL(FAPEDIDO.usrpedi2, '01-jan-1990') = ( SELECT ISNULL(usrpedi2, '01-jan-1990') FROM FAPEDIDO WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Cd_pedido = ':1' ) AND FAPEDIDO.campo143 NOT IN ('E') GROUP BY FAITEMPE.Cd_material ,and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel ,and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada ,ESMATERI.Descricao ,ESMATERI.Peso ,GEEMPRES.Cd_empresa ,GEEMPRES.Nome_completo ,GEEMPRES.Fantasia ,vendedor.Cd_empresa ,vendedor.Nome_completo ,vendedor.Fantasia HAVING ISNULL(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel, 0) - ISNULL(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada, 0) - SUM(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo) < 0

SELECT FAITEMPE.Cd_material, FAITEMPE.Cd_unid_de_neg, FAITEMPE.Cd_pedido, GEEMPRES.Nome_completo, SUM(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo) AS quantidade FROM FAITEMPE WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN GEEMPRES WITH(NOLOCK) ON GEEMPRES.Cd_empresa = FAITEMPE.Cd_empresa INNER JOIN FAPEDIDO WITH(NOLOCK) ON FAPEDIDO.Cd_pedido = FAITEMPE.Cd_pedido INNER JOIN getopera WITH(NOLOCK) ON FAITEMPE.Cd_tipo_operaca = getopera.Cd_tipo_operaca INNER JOIN esespeci WITH(NOLOCK) ON getopera.Cd_especie_esto = esespeci.Cd_especie_esto AND FAPEDIDO.Controle NOT IN('50', '45') AND FAPEDIDO.Controle >= '28' AND ESESPECI.tipo NOT IN('N') WHERE faitempe.Controle >= '28' AND faitempe.Cd_especie = 'R' AND FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo > '0' AND FAITEMPE.Cd_centro_armaz IN ('EXPE','RESE','QUAR','BONI') and FAPEDIDO.campo143 not in ('E') AND FAITEMPE.Cd_material = ':1' AND FAPEDIDO.Cd_unid_de_neg = ':2' GROUP BY FAITEMPE.Cd_material, FAITEMPE.Cd_unid_de_neg, FAITEMPE.Cd_pedido, GEEMPRES.Nome_completo;
